name: BLASTER (macha777) (macha777) (macha777)
description:
Let's get a HIGH SCORE on the BLASTBOARD

BLAST OR BE BLASTED

keyboard keys

WASD for up, down, left right

ESC for pause

arrow keys to aim your BLASTER weapons

spacebar to fire your BLASTER weapons

hold down the spacebar for RAPID FIRE

Video Game Controller controls

left circle trigger is for movement

right circle trigger is to BLAST enemies

you can activate RAPID FIRE on your gamepad

Play BLASTER in single player and multiplayer modes

Collects coins and score 1000000000 points to win the game

Let's play a new twin stick shooter called BLASTER  

BLASTER is Created by Andy 

Purchase BLASTER for a $1 dollar 

Let's play BLASTER
